Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that two people use to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string between the two cups in the string telephone.
The student can show how the device uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can depict only the materials provided, like a cup and string, used in the string telephone.
The student can include details in the drawing that demonstrate how this device helps people communicate over long distances.
